subtitle.line1: Internxt Meet offers fully private video calls powered by post-quantum cryptography, ensuring your
subtitle.line2: meetings are secure, confidential, and free from trackers.

HeroSection.include: Included with Premium and Ultimate plans

FeaturesSection1.title: Why Internxt stands out as the most secure and private cloud storage
FeaturesSection1.description: Internxt integrates advanced privacy features to offer the most secure cloud storage for your peace of mind.

info.title: Award-winning encryption
info.description: Our system is built with Kyber 512 post-quantum cryptography, the best encryption standard chosen by the NIST Institute to protect against the future threats of quantum computers, which could theoretically break the current encryption protocols used by other cloud storage service providers. Secure your data with Internxt to future-proof the privacy of your files.

info.title: No more reliance on Big Tech
info.description: Other cloud storage service providers, Google, Dropbox, etc, profit from your data, storing and analyzing your files, leading to emails and other personal information leaking online. Internxt is different. With anonymous account creation and a strict no-tracking policy, we don’t store, share, or monetize your data in any way.

info.title: Accessible from anywhere
info.description: Download Internxt Drive from your favorite cloud storage app to access the cloud on Windows, Mac, Linux, iOS, or Android. We also offer other private cloud storage solutions with WebDAV and Rclone support, allowing you to manage your files effortlessly across multiple devices, automate backups, and access your data remotely.

info.title: Open source and audited
info.description: Other cloud storage platforms hide their source code from the public, meaning you can never truly know how they handle your data or what they do with your files. Internxt promises full transparency, as the source code for all our products is publicly available on GitHub. Internxt is also verified as a secure platform by Securitum, an independent penetration testing company.

info.title: Sustainability
info.description: Our commitment to building a better future built on online privacy also extends to our commitment to a greener future. Our data centers use renewable energy sources such as nuclear and hydroelectricity. Using environmentally friendly technology helps our commitment to build a more sustainable future and be climate-neutral by 2050.

info.title: GDPR compliant
info.description: Based in Valencia, Spain, Internxt ensures your data is private and secure by complying with GDPR data protection laws. A personal Drive account keeps your information private with no tracking, sharing, or unauthorized access and, for businesses, reduces the risk of fines and legal issues for businesses.

FeaturesSectionImg.title: A private video call platform for everyone
FeaturesSectionImg.subtitle: Internxt Meet is built to meet the needs of everyone looking to communicate and collaborate with others with guaranteed privacy and security.

cards.title: Personal
cards.description: Host private video calls via a secure link and chat with your guests, knowing your conversations are protected.

cards.title: Business
cards.description: Meet in privacy with your clients, team, or departments to keep sensitive or confidential private and protected from leaks.

cards.title: Lawyers
cards.description: Meet with others to share and discuss information in complete privacy to protect client privileges.

cards.title: Medical
cards.description: Reduce the risk of medical data breaches by hosting and sharing your own private video call with patients.

FeaturesSection.title: Enjoy the freedom of speech and privacy
FeaturesSection.subtitle: Chat with others with our encrypted video chat platform for private meetings protected with the most advanced post-quantum encryption.

cards.title: Private video calls
cards.description: Use Internxt Meet for video or audio calls you want to keep private. Zero trackers. Zero data collection and nothing linking you or anybody else to your calls.

cards.title: Screen sharing
cards.description: Collaborate easily and share your presentations, spreadsheets, and more with Internxt’s screen-sharing feature.

cards.title: Security
cards.description: All your conversations, videos, chats, and messages are kept secure with zero-knowledge encryption. We give you total control of your privacy, and we never access your conversations or messages.

cards.title: Superior speed and video quality
cards.description: AI powers crystal-clear video calls at lightning speed, optimizing bandwidth and quality while ensuring end-to-end encryption for total privacy.

faq.question: What is Internxt Meet?
answer: Internxt Meet is the most secure video conferencing platform where you can talk, chat, and host meetings in complete privacy. With Internxt Meet, all your conversations and calls are held in complete privacy thanks to our advanced and award-winning encryption. All calls between you and your team are kept private and secure

faq.question: Is Internxt Meet an alternative to Google Meet?
answer: Yes, Internxt Meet is a secure alternative to Google Meet, Zoom, and Teams. We use zero-knowledge encryption with post-quantum cryptography to ensure only you can hear or see your video calls. Not even Internxt has access to your chats or calls.

faq.question: Is Internxt Meet free?
answer: Internxt Meet is available when you subscribe to any of our premium plans, offering access to our full suite of privacy-focused products, including Internxt Drive, Mail, Antivirus, and VPN.

faq.question: How do I contact support?
answer: Can't find what you're looking for? You can contact our Customer Success team via live chat or by sending an email to hello@internxt.com.

faq.question: What is Internxt’s refund policy?
answer: Internxt offers a standard 30-day money-back guarantee across all its paid subscriptions, which starts counting as soon as you subscribe.
If you're ever unsatisfied with our service, email us at hello@internxt.com to request a refund.

FeatureSection.title: The most secure video conferencing alternative to Big Tech
FeatureSection.titleLine2: Join Internxt in building a more secure, private web experience with our encrypted, private suite of products designed to give you control of your privacy.
FeatureSection.description: Enjoy Meet, Mail, Antivirus, and VPN as part of your Internxt Drive plan on Windows, Mac, or Linux.

element1.title: European privacy
element1.description: Internxt complies with the GDPR, which protects your data with the best privacy laws for security, transparency, and control over your personal information.

element2.title: Security
description: Internxt uses end-to-end and post-quantum encryption, providing you with the most secure video conferencing platform for your privacy.

element3.title: Sustainability
description: We are committed to a more sustainable and green future, so our products only use renewable and energy-efficient power technologies.
